name: Magi (itch)
description:
This is a game of little vignette levels about the Three Wise Men getting their infamous gifts of gold, frankincense and myrrh. On the scale of KKairos games from "chill" to "frantic" it occupies a relatively "chill" setting, though the "Gold" board is fairly fast action, at least at the end. Saving is recommended!
